languages.text: "Тервантьяс играет с твоим разумом! Они — подделки, а твоя душа нетронута. Он хочет, чтобы ты верила в его всевластие над тобой!"
"Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"
languages.original_text: "Тервантьяс играет с твоим разумом! Они — подделки, а твоя душа нетронута. Он хочет, чтобы ты верила в его всевластие над тобой!"

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"
"Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

"Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"
"Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

languages.text: «¡Tervantias está jugando con su mente! Estas son sus creaciones, pero su alma permanece intacta. ¡Quiere hacerle creer que tiene control total de usted!».
languages.original_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tervantias está jugando con su mente! Estas son sus creaciones, pero su alma permanece intacta. ¡Quiere hacerle creer que tiene control total de usted!».

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアスは君の心をもてあそんでいる！あれは奴が作り出した偽りで、君の魂は汚されていない。奴は君を底なしの力で支配していると思わせたいんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアスは君の心をもてあそんでいる！あれは奴が作り出した偽りで、君の魂は汚されていない。奴は君を底なしの力で支配していると思わせたいんだ！」

languages.text: “特万提亚斯在玩弄你的思想！他根本没办法触碰你的灵魂，这两个人都是他做出来的冒牌货。他想让你以为他什么事情都能做得到！”
languages.original_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

traits.locale_text: “特万提亚斯在玩弄你的思想！他根本没办法触碰你的灵魂，这两个人都是他做出来的冒牌货。他想让你以为他什么事情都能做得到！”

languages.text: "Tervantias spielt mit Eurem Verstand. Sie sind sein Werk und Eure Seele ist unberührt. Er will glauben, dass er uneingeschränkte Macht über Euch hat."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias spielt mit Eurem Verstand. Sie sind sein Werk und Eure Seele ist unberührt. Er will glauben, dass er uneingeschränkte Macht über Euch hat."

languages.text: « Tervantias joue avec votre esprit ! Ce ne sont que des pantins qu'il a créés de ses mains, mais votre âme demeure intacte. Il cherche seulement à vous faire croire que vous êtes entièrement en son pouvoir ! »
languages.original_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"

traits.locale_text: « Tervantias joue avec votre esprit ! Ce ne sont que des pantins qu'il a créés de ses mains, mais votre âme demeure intacte. Il cherche seulement à vous faire croire que vous êtes entièrement en son pouvoir ! »

languages.text: "Tervantias, aklınla oyun oynuyor! Bunlar onun sahte yaratımları ve ruhun dokunulmamış durumda. Senin üzerinde sınırsız gücü olduğuna inanmanı istiyor!"
languages.original_text: "Tervantias is toying with your mind! They are his fake creations, and your soul is untouched. He wants you to believe that he holds limitless power over you!"
